meanings.definition: Improvised or makeshift solution or repair
meanings.sent1: The kludged fix on the broken chair held up surprisingly well.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic used a kludged solution to get the car running temporarily.
meanings.sent3: The kludged repair on the leaky pipe ended up causing more problems.
meanings.sent4: His explanation was a kludged attempt to cover up his mistake.
meanings.sent5: The kludged solution to the puzzle left everyone scratching their heads.

meanings.definition: To put together or make something in a makeshift or improvised way
meanings.sent1: She kludged together a costume for the school play using old clothes.
meanings.sent2: He kludged a shelter out of branches and leaves while camping in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The kids kludged a spaceship out of cardboard boxes for their game.
meanings.sent4: The team kludged a plan to escape from the locked room.
meanings.sent5: They kludged a solution to the problem at the last minute.
